name: Sheepit Shepherd
description:
Where have all your Sheepit gone? You are a Sheepit Shepherd and you must track down your Sheepit and bring them back to the pen.

Watch out for the Baddies! They will try to chase your Sheepit away!

This game was made in 7 days for VimJam.

Focus: Collectables

Theme: There and Back
